title: 641: IS $100K BITCOIN STILL POSSIBLE IN 2021?!!!
description:
Crypto trader and market analyst Lark Davis is looking to the past to see if Bitcoin could hit six figures this year.

Davis says that the current BTC price action is reminiscent of Ethereum’s 2017 bull run.

“Is there precedent for an asset having a massive run up, then a long brutal corrective period followed by a spectacular blow off top later that year?"

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit YT channel at http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
